languages.text: [Обратиться к работнику] "Всякого нарушителя ждет соразмерное наказание. Я не стану защищать вора".
[Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к работнику] "Всякого нарушителя ждет соразмерное наказание. Я не стану защищать вора".

traits.locale_text: [Address the worker] "Every transgressor will receive proportionate punishment. I will not protect a thief."
[Address the worker] "Every transgressor will receive proportionate punishment. I will not protect a thief."
[Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."
[Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."
[Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."
[Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."

languages.text: [Dirigirte al traidor] «Todos los delitos deben recibir su castigo. No ofrezco ninguna protección a los ladrones».
languages.original_text: [Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte al traidor] «Todos los delitos deben recibir su castigo. No ofrezco ninguna protección a los ladrones».

languages.text: [労働者に話しかける]「犯罪は、すべて適切に罰せられる。泥棒を保護するつもりはない」
languages.original_text: [Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."

traits.locale_text: [労働者に話しかける]「犯罪は、すべて適切に罰せられる。泥棒を保護するつもりはない」

languages.text: [对工人开口]“所有罪犯都要接受相应的惩罚，我是不会保护窃贼的。”
languages.original_text: [Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."

traits.locale_text: [对工人开口]“所有罪犯都要接受相应的惩罚，我是不会保护窃贼的。”

languages.text: [Den Arbeiter ansprechen] "Jedes Verbrechen wird angemessen bestraft. Diebe genießen bei mir keinen Schutz."
languages.original_text: [Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."

traits.locale_text: [Den Arbeiter ansprechen] "Jedes Verbrechen wird angemessen bestraft. Diebe genießen bei mir keinen Schutz."

languages.text: [Vous adresser à l'ouvrier] « Tout crime doit être puni en conséquence. Les voleurs ne méritent pas ma protection. »
languages.original_text: [Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser à l'ouvrier] « Tout crime doit être puni en conséquence. Les voleurs ne méritent pas ma protection. »

languages.text: [İşçiyle konuş] "İşlenen her bir suç, gerektiği gibi cezalandırılacaktır. Hırsızlara koruma sağlamam."
languages.original_text: [Address the worker] "Every crime will be punished accordingly. I offer no protection to thieves."
